text: Kuma kana ganin rana idan ta fito tana karkata daga kogonsu wajen dama kuma idan ta faɗi tana gurgura su wajen hagu, kuma su, suna a cikin wani fili daga gare shi. Wannan abu yana daga ayoyin Allah. Wanda Allah Ya shiryar, to shi ne mai shiryuwa, kuma wanda Allah Ya ɓatar to ba za ka samar masa wani majiɓinci mai shiryarwa ba
